title: Inside Hyper Skin's Community-Based Preorder Strategy for Tariff Survival
description: On Monday, Desiree Verdejo, the founder of indie beauty brand Hyper Skin, took to social media to lift the curtain on the realities of running a small company amid tariff uncertainty in the U.S. Posting to both her personal Instagram account as well as the brand's, she took transparency to a new ...Continue reading
author: Steph Saltzman
